nodes.text: Pam Hyatt (born around 1936) is a Canadian actress who voiced Bozzie on Ewoks and Bola Yomm on Star Wars: Droids. Around the same time, she played Noble Heart Horse in Care Bears Movie II: A New Generation. More recently, she has starred in the English version of InuYasha as Kaede, guest-starred in USA Network's The Dead Zone and voices Campe and Atropos in Class of the Titans. Hyatt is the mother of Carson T. Foster and Zack Ward.
